articles.title: WordPress maker Automattic lays off 16% of staff - TechCrunch
articles.description: Automattic, the company behind WordPress.com, Tumblr, WooCommerce, and a range of other online services, is reducing its workforce. The layoffs will
articles.content: Automattic, the company behind WordPress.com, Tumblr, WooCommerce, and a range of other online services, is reducing its workforce. The layoffs will impact 16% of staff across divisions, an Automatti… [+2323 chars]
